website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking sparring gloves that will give you a good level of performance at a reasonable price.
pros: Gloves contain a high level of padding in the knuckle and wrist areas to make them comfortable to use
Palm includes pinholes in the fabric that allows for airflow to keep your hands feeling cooler
Offered in a couple of different color options and in multiple weights so you can find the perfect gloves for your needs
cons: Padding on the inside of the gloves may slide around after several sparring sessions

customer_reviews.title: Look good but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these gloves but less than 10 days training the seams busted on the ends of my hand and wrist. They look great but quality lacks. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Review after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I will update this again after a month (and as well after 3) So far so good. I use my heavy punching bag nearly every day. Since getting these I have used these gloves exclusively to test out their durability. The gloves are great. They are the exact weight stated and have not yet shown signs of tearing. in a few more weeks I will update. After that I will only update once they start tearing to give an idea of how long they may hold up. If they last even 3 months the $20 would have been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These gloves feel amazing and look cool too! they were the perfect fit. Ordered a black pair for my son for Christmas....was one of his fave gifts! He does boxing training...me kickboxing..so I ordered myself a white pair. usually I use the fingerless gloves for training...but these Hawk Gloves give you a feeling of more power. And confidence!
customer_reviews.author: ktangelic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed, I loved the last pair
customer_reviews.text: Re-ordered this pair from a pair I bought last year. These are much tighter some of the markings are the same but its very clear that workmanship has gone way down. The last pair lasted 6 month. These have insulation coming out from the inside where the fabric is ripped. I use them 2-4 times a week at cardio boxing classes... Pretty disappointed, I loved the last pair.
customer_reviews.author: TOSH

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about buying these but I just spent 300 on a bag and more expensive gloves were out of the question. However, i am glad i did. These gloves feel like good quality and though I'll get better gloves next month I'm pretty sure these will hold up well. Heck, i may not even need to get new gloves next month as these look like they will handle some abuse. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: MR DAREN ALI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently bought a standing punching bag and was looking to buy some gloves. I've read tons of reviews of different brands but not happy about the price. These were around the price point I was looking for and the reviews were pretty good. I'm glad I ordered them. I have really small hands and the 14 oz. fits perfectly. This protects my hands w/o needing wraps. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: LilMsT

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, great padding even against the wall.
customer_reviews.text: When I first slid my hands into these, I thought they were going to be too small. What I found, though is that they fit perfectly, just differently than other gloves I own. These don't have wiggle room, and they are stiff enough to hold their shape well. I know they are made for bags, but I wanted a better test of how well my hand would be protected, so I punched the wall with them a few times. They were great! Glad to have picked these up!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: WE RECIEVED 2 RIGHT HAND BOXING GLOVES!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, how is my daughter supposed to use these? *******We recieved 2 RIGHT HAND BOXING GLOVES!!!!!!!********* Becareful when you order these and PLEASE make sure you check the priduct ASAP!!!!!! We had WAAAAY too much trust with our Amazon orders, my son recieved a right and left, so we just assumed that it was okay.
customer_reviews.author: KrysMarie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for; looks better than it is
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look pretty, but they aren’t very comfortable and feel cheaply made. They smell of extremely strong chemicals, and the synthetic leather around them is not flexible. The foam is not soft, and it is noticeably less comfortable to box with compared to the gloves I rent at the gym. They also don’t breathe with a cheap lining, causing them to get wetter with sweat. For the price, they are OK I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine_Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are very soft but not to the point that they do not absorb the shock while hitting the bag they looked huge when taken out of the package but when my 22 year old son put them on they fit awesome protected his knuckles while hitting the bag but was soft enought that he can still spar with them he loves they way they fit and the stitching looks great i think these will hold up for a long time the velcro is very thick on the wrist and seems as though it will hold up for a long time as well
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Obviously a little stiff currently but i used them the the day i recieved them. No cramping or pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Redheaded Momma

customer_reviews.title: starters
customer_reviews.text: great for hobby boxers that are boxing for recreational purposes. I am not sure if these are suitable for professional use but they fit the glove for group boxing classes and novice sparring! fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: penn

customer_reviews.title: ... the reviews but when they arrived I was very disappointed. The thumb pouch digs into my hand to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to buy these gloves based on the reviews but when they arrived I was very disappointed. The thumb pouch digs into my hand to the point that I actually considered cutting the entire thing off! It actually ruins bag work because the joint is so uncomfortable. Additionally, I was hoping for more padding (16oz) around the knuckles as mine usually get very cut up but there was little to no protection. I may try cutting the thumb but otherwise will likely just throw them away, horrible purchase :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for price
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended as long as you order the right size for your hands. I ordered 8 oz size for my daughter who has small build. The gloves are attractive and durable with a nice snug fit. Very pleased with product especially considering the reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Issue with the glove
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish on these gloves and the way they feel but my only dislike and my reason for not wearing them going forward is on the right hand glove there is an issue with the thumb place ment my thumb keeps getting hit. I have other pairs of gloves and I dont have this issue so I believe it is the glove..... I believe it is a defect in the making of the glove I would like to have them replaced since I just purchased them not long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hydroxside

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stepping up your boxing game!
customer_reviews.text: I started boxing almost a year ago and have been using the gloves that the trainer provides... which are ok but they are just cheap gloves that have been worn by who knows how many different people. These gloves are perfect and they fasten to your hand a lot easier than some other brands! Plus they look so good!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gayheart

customer_reviews.title: ease if getting off and on
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and feel of them. Can hit hard and not hurt my hand. Dislike - harder to get off and on quickly when I am changing over to quick break exercise. The material inside around the fingers seems to be coming loose so when I put my fingers in they catch on the material. This could be a huge issue for me if that gets worse.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I only use these for about 30 mins each week for kick boxing class but they work just fine! A little snug around the right thumb but I'm sure they will stretch out a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Not as tight as they seem at first.
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure about these gloves. The openings seemed too small for me to use for a workout class. Wow, I was wrong. They opened right up. And they were perfect for the task. The velcro makes it easy on and off. The quality seems high enough for three times a week workout.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are AMAZING! Very cool, comfortable, and true to size. In fact, I ordered the wrong size and went to return them, but they didn’t have my size in stock. The company reached out and solved the whole problem in just a few days. I highly recommend this seller and these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and works well. I use them for exercise on a heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty big hands so I got the biggest size they have. I know it's better to have something a little snug so your hands don't slip or anything but this is a little too snug. I have to do a lot of switching and pushing to get my hands in and it's a little uncomfortable to wear. My hands actually start to hurt if I wear them for more than like 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Malik Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: Let's start by saying, I don't actually box. This was actually used initially for me to do strength training. Now it has become more used for my girlfriend and I to play fight. It has lasted and haven't seen much wear and tear on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Many rounds weekly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on price for a boxing class I teach 4 times a week. They get plenty of use and are still holding together! Great value for beginners or someone looking for gloves to beat up on... These are not high end performance gloves, but definitely get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Young

customer_reviews.title: Heavybag beginner
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself, a beginner using them on a heavybag. Its my first set of gloves so i really have nothing to compare them to but i like them. They do have some off stitching like others have said but i paid 20$ for these so i cant complain. id buy again. I'll edit if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son s martial art class. A little stiff at first but good construction and the gel in the glove provide good hand protection. Seems to also do well with sweat and odor. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Meilhon

customer_reviews.title: My First Pair of Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair of gloves. It's been about 7 months now and they're holding up really well. To clean them, use a 50-50 mixture of vinegar and water.
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I got these hawk boxing gloves for my son who boxes and does some MMA. They were a little bigger than we thought when we measured them but just by a tad. The quality is nice and similar to the ones (or better) that he uses at the studio. My son said they are very comfortable and he doesn't mind the extra room as he is still growing. I would highly recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!! Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are great. Their made of quality material and feel very durable. They have great customer service as well. I contacted them on a concern I had with the shipment and they resolved everything within hours!! Will definitely do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves them...
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything negative about them as I don't use them. My wife has only had good things to say about comfort when using them with a heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Nice and comfy. Takes the impact well. Make sure to properly measure your size.
customer_reviews.author: bleet

customer_reviews.title: Spend extra and get better gloves
customer_reviews.text: Gloves suck ...no good protection for your knuckles and your palms get incredibly sweaty inside
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time user
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for as beginner in a class and didn't want to spend a lot up front. So far they have been heavily used for 3 months without any sign of damage on them! For the price I figured if the last 3 months I'd be happy and the look like they will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and found the gloves are very nice but fit too tightly on the knuckles. I had to return them and buy another brand. I ended up buying a smaller size in the other brand and the fit was much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and protect well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner, but I can tell you they are comfortable. Protects my hands well and they look really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make punching a heavy bag safe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for boxing pad and heavy bag workout. Durable with protection at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used these things pretty frequently for about 6 months now, and there is very little noticeable wear on them. I would say these are a great, cheap alternative for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: JoeJoe

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate to buy these. Sturdy and durable and they look good. Great value. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves these. We practice with these and she gets a pretty good workout with the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The quality is pretty tough. I imagine you can get into a few good fights with these on. They are really good for trainin, which is what I've used them for. So far no issues or problems with durability.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wild

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t want to spend a lot of money and  are a good choice
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t go wrong great for beginners to intermediate skill and or strength person
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Overall, good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use them much, because I was sent two right handed gloves, not a pair, but I can say that for beginners, theses are a great start. Mine also came smaller than I expected ( I weigh 175lb and stand at 5’10”), the 16oz glove fit rather snug, I’d advise going a size bigger and buying hand wraps for beginners. If you don’t need hand wraps then it’s true to size, but every beginner should use them to prevent wrist injury.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These gloves exceeded my expectations. They look and feel great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: DrewManChu

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves! So far, they are super comfortable for hitting the bag & sparring....easy on the hands. I prefer the velco straps for taking the gloves off & on easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Very good training & sparring gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good quality gloves, The gloves are holding up well, after over 15 heavy bag work outs. For the price you can't beat these gloves. Good fit and feel and they are durable as far as I can tell..
customer_reviews.author: D.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pair. One for me and one for my son. We have used them 3 times now on a heavy bag. I have the 16 oz and my son has the 14 oz. They are well made and work well. So far I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S. Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Great For Striking
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. Inexpensive and great padding for heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bussey

customer_reviews.title: Seem nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had much time to break them in since we are at work or school all the time but they seem nice for the price. We'll update later
customer_reviews.author: Musa becton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Glad I bought it and am using it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good price but inside falls apart pretty quick. I hear most do so don’t want to rate too low. Other than that the gloves are great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Size issues
customer_reviews.text: 16oz gloves are not compatible with anyone who has relatively relatively big hands.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great for heavy gloves. Take some getting used to. Very durable but makes them somewhat inflexible.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great service and a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves and so far they are working great. The pair I ordered had a slight defect, but the company was great about sending out another pair. I tried the new pair out on a heavy bag and they felt great. I’d recommend giving these a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Wayne Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and great protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 yr old on the heavy bag. His hands are protected well with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cute, and great price
customer_reviews.text: Super durable and cute. They are very big for my tiny hands of death. Love that they are 16 oz, makes it more of a challenge to keep my hands up and away from throwing lazy punches. Also I punch faster when they are off because the added ounces are gone:)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: these are quality gloves!
customer_reviews.text: purchased these to replace the subpar everlast pair that came with my bag - it’s like night and day! wrapped my hands, gloved up and was hammering away for a while until my arms gave out... these things really did a great job cushioning my hands.
customer_reviews.author: nayrev

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Well made, breathable, exactly what was needed and arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: Britnylove13

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for fun or practice
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and feel great. Landed some good hits with these bad boys and they feel nice on hand. Not too expensive and the material feels good
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nice happy the way they are now when my son gets mad he puts them on and hits his bag to take out anger
customer_reviews.author: Maranda A Cook

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: These look enormous and hoping they fit him but they did and he and his Dad ues them - 10 oz size
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Currie

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and fit great
customer_reviews.text: these gloves feel perfect on the hand and the inside hand comfort is perfect for hitting the bag
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore it, it was right but as time goes by, it fits my wrist already. I punch very conveniently without any problems. I love the color and the design!
customer_reviews.author: Jorelle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable and well-made for the money I'm pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: david bell

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have been great! I use them to work on a heavy bag. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Heath M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids of all ages, durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my boys some time ago. I expected them be destroyed within a couple of weeks like past gloves have, but they are still in great condition. The boys, 11 and 13, love them. They have neighborhood as young as 7 and up to 19 come to the yard for boxing matches. Everyone likes them.
customer_reviews.author: TaVonne

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE & SHARP
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great. Soon as I brought them to the gym to wear em in everybody took notice. They are sharp and simple and maintain their look! I've been using them for over a month and I have had no discomfort whatsoever! I'm definitely buying another pair soon hopefully!
customer_reviews.author: Salaam

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are so very well made! I look forward to purchasing similar items soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sdickenson

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and only have used them for a short while. I will update my review as I have more time with these gloves. So far, no issues and quality of the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mauney

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are well made and provide excellent cushion for my daughters knuckles. She is 15 and loves these gloves for heavy bag workouts.
customer_reviews.author: D. MANNING

customer_reviews.title: Snug and durable
customer_reviews.text: The first few times the gloves are really stiff and bit snug. Eventually, they loosen up a but, and are really great gloves. So, far they seem like they will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit OK but the vinyl does not line up with the other part so it is hard to keep the gloves from Unwrapping make sure you open when you receive because if you wait you would not be able to return them if something is wrong like in my case
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these in 14oz and the quality is great! Seriously I bought a couple pair for the ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! I purchased these in 14oz and the quality is great! Seriously I bought a couple pair for the gym to sell... keeping a pair for myself! My Twins Pro Boxing and Top KIngs... These are right up there with them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rexy

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought 14oz. Great padding, nice looking gloves but between the thumb and index is a little light for my hand. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Keleb l

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, I got the 16oz ones and they felt very light. The gel makes it feel very thing, maybe I’d like them better if they felt more padded. All around comfortable and good for beginners exercices and training. They do start thinning out a bit with time.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boxing gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boxing gloves for the price. Looks really cool, and I have been using it for about a month and a half. It's been going, but seems as if it would not be super durable for longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Stefanidis

customer_reviews.title: Overall review
customer_reviews.text: These are truly great gloves for under 30 dollars, I have ordered 2 pair one white pair 14oz and one black pair 16oz and I am a frequent boxer and I use them roughly an hour and a half a day, they break in lovely and hit great, no complaints, also the graphics on them are sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: i just got them, i am just hitting the bag, and so far so good. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money but not great. Smell awful after only a few uses despite being advertised as bacteria or odor free.
customer_reviews.author: Ceh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality on the sewing, on perfect time w/ fast delivery, happy and satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Arasely Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The gloves arrived on time and presentation was a solid 8/10. The gloves are better than I expected and for the price, u really can't go wrong. I didnt notice any scratches or unwanted Mark's which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I have had the gloves for less then two months and the stitching has come off the whole thing is falling apart. Very cheap, I wasn’t even able to use them for more then 4/5 times if that. Garbage of a product
customer_reviews.author: Sarmo

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality leather
customer_reviews.text: This should not happen to a high quality Leather product. I suppose i bought a fake. so don't ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bony Jamson

customer_reviews.title: They definitely prevent phalanges dislocation
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit, I wear these to practice punching and sparring just in case a smart one wants to play around
customer_reviews.author: Michael Litv

customer_reviews.title: So so okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the pads on the gloves, I dislike the way it hurt my left pinky finger.
customer_reviews.author: Ali .Y. Dauda

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the white ones o purchased that were supposed to be the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Quick fast service. Product is as advertised. No complaints. Works great. Son uses for sparing and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Look cool
customer_reviews.text: Got these To mess around with my punching bag, my kids love to play with them fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Inman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves awesome for boxing especially if your just getting into it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Halloween so I can’t say how functional they are. Worked great for my costume. Seems like they were good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this gloves and had a problem with one of them. The customer service solved the issue. The gloves are overall good and at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Markieff

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Science
customer_reviews.text: Had these gloves a few months now, I got to the gym everyday and hit the bag and they've held up nicely. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: delvon Simmons

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know much about purchasing sizes and weights. Got them and they will fit a person with small dainty hands, so one size does not fit all. The bigger the oz the bigger the hand fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Abel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Its a really good product and the company stands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Blacky

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a boxer but u got these for a boy camp. Great buy, lasted through tough workouts, no tips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Amira Daoud

customer_reviews.title: Strange cut - painfully uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The padding seems ok, but the cut of one glove makes just have them on my hands painful, making glove worthless. Better to use one of my other pair, including an older one that's now falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product , fit exactly and quality wise it is great
customer_reviews.author: alp

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time buying this brand. I have used other brands before. They look nice and they serve the purpose. Just for exercise purposes, I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Rebosura

customer_reviews.title: Used for training
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought that they were too big, but I gave them a try and really like them. They just need broke in to fit your hands. I’m not a fighter. I’m taking beginner boxing classes for my health. They’re great for what I need, and you can’t find a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Riffle

customer_reviews.title: Solid gloves so far. I've punched through 3 8oz ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid gloves so far. I've punched through 3 8oz Everlast gloves in the past year in a half, to the point I can see my knuckles, these gloves have held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Guess

customer_reviews.title: The size is tight so be sure to get right one
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were just a cheap pair, to get me by. Turns out its a 20 dollar steal haha
customer_reviews.author: Justin clayton

product_meta.title: Hawk Sports HWK Boxing Gloves for Men & Women Training Pro Punching Heavy Bag Mitts UFC MMA Muay Thai Sparring Kickboxing Gloves, 1 Year Warranty!!!!
product_meta.description: Premium synthetic leather along with excellent glove construction provides long lasting durability and functionality. New full mesh palm ensures breathability and comfort while a moisture absorbing and anti-microbial lining retains freshness, extending the life of your equipment. Exclusive Gel Lining and multi-layered foam padding for the ultimate in style & performance. Our gloves promote proper punching technique because they are conformed to the natural shape of your fist. Dense, innovative two-layer foam provides better shock absorbency and full padding on the front, back and wrist to promote proper punching technique. These gloves also utilize our exclusive ThumbLok feature for added safety. Choose from traditional laceup or hook-and-loop wrist strap for quick on and off. Made of durable synthetic leather. Natural anatomical shape conforms to hand. Correct positioning of your fist makes the gloves feel more comfortable and helps to prevent injury. Velcro strap to provide a close fit. A large velcro wrist wrap ensures plenty of wrist protection to minimise the risk of injuy and a mesh inner palm area keeps your hands cool and limits sweating so your gloves don't rub during workouts
feature_bullets: Gel Infused & Multi Layered V-Impact Foam: Reduces the chance of injuring your fists.
Extra-thick Supremo-Shock Foam based padding on knuckles with separate padded block over wrist-joint
The Breathable Pinhole Palm Offers Increased Hygeine Efficiency: No Unwanted Odours and Bacteria
Ideal for sparring, heavy bag workouts, and mitt work | Hook & Loop wrist strap for quick on-and-off
Super dense impact resistant multi-layer gel integrated padding over knuckle-side with added block p
